title: Christy Turlington is leggy in black while Iman is curvy in deep red at Night Of Stars Gala in NYC
text:
They are two of the most beautiful women in the world.

And on Thursday night, veteran supermodels Christy Turlington and Iman lit up the red carpet at the FGI Night Of Stars Gala in New York City.

While Christy, 50, went for a leggy look in a black dress, Iman, 64, opted to show off her curves in a deep red gown.

Fashion icons: Veteran supermodels Christy Turlington, left, and Iman, right, lit up the red carpet at the FGI Night Of Stars Gala in New York City on Thursday night

Christy's dress had long sleeves and was gathered at the hip on one side to create an asymmetrical hemline.

She paired it with peep-toe black heels with laces across the top.

Her hair was swept back into a chignon with a section left loose on one side to soften the look and frame her face.

She accessorized with pendant earrings, carried a small black clutch purse and added a splash of color with bright red lipstick.

Leggy: Christy's dress had long sleeves and was gathered at the hip on one side to create an asymmetrical hemline. She paired it with peep-toe black heels with laces across the top

Stylish: Christy, 50, wore her hair swept back into a chignon. She accessorized with pendant earrings and added a splash of color with bright red lipstick

Iman's sleeveless gown had a cross halter neck and fell to the floor, pooling around her feet as she posed for photos.

Cinched at the waist, it hugged her curves.

She wore her hair loose and styled in large ringlet-style curls and she added diamond earrings.

The widow of David Bowie completed her look with smoky eye-shadow and glossy dark pink lip color.

Classy: Iman's sleeveless gown had a cross halter neck and fell to the floor, pooling around her feet as she posed for photos. Cinched at the waist, it hugged her curves

Natural beauty: The widow of David Bowie, 64, wore her hair loose in large ringlet-style curls, added diamond earrings and completed her look with smoky eye-shadow and glossy lip color
